msItem.title: Laxdæla saga
msItem.rubric: Saga þesse kallast Laxdæla af gómlum Jslendingum
msItem.explicit: Bolle fieck Sigride giaford gófust og lauk vel vid hana
msItem.finalRubric: og hófum vier ej heirt þessa sógu leinger.
msItem.note: A copy of the 'Z' redaction according to Kålund's edition (cf. typescript catalog). After the saga are two verses about Kjartan and Bolli by Þorður Magnússon á Strjúgi: Visa um Kiartan Olafssyne er ordte Þordur Magnusson. Kiært var konge biørtum / Kiartans til i hiarta / kurteis kappin virdte / kirtils tignar snirtir / Bar tidt stäl og birti / bert vid dreira herta / styrt gat stiriar kierti / stört hann afl ei skorte. Onnur visa um Bolla. Bolli snilldar snille / sniallur ä bar hialle / vella værn nam þollur / villa aurva spillir / Fiellu frä honum heiller / fullu banda ulli / illa sins hann olle / allmiog frænda falle.

msItem.title: Ketils saga hængs
msItem.rubric: Her biriar Søgu þatt af Katle Hæng
msItem.incipit: Hallbiørn het madur er kalladur var halftroll
msItem.explicit: Ketill riede fyrer Hrafnistu á medann hann lifde

filiation.p: Based on AM 173 fol. or a related MS (cf. typescript catalog).

msItem.title: Gríms saga loðinkinna
msItem.incipit: So er sagt af Grime syne Ketils ad hann var bæde mikill og sterkur
msItem.explicit: hans son var Orvar Oddur er Lopthæna fædde hónum
msItem.finalRubric: og likur hier so þessum þætte af Grime lodinnkinna

filiation.p: Based on AM 173 fol. or a related MS (cf. typescript catalog).

msItem.note: Given as a continuation of Ketils saga hængs, albeit with separate chapter enumeration.

msItem.title: Örvar-Odds saga
msItem.rubric: Hier biriar søguna af Orvar Odde syne Grims lodinnkinna
msItem.incipit: Þad er upphaf þessarar sógu ad madur er nefndur Grimur lodinnkinne
msItem.explicit: enn su mær sem Oddur ätti i Irlande för nordur til Hrafnistu, og er mikel ætt frä henne komenn
msItem.finalRubric: og lukum vier hier Orvar Odds sógu

filiation.p: Based on AM 173 fol. or a related MS (cf. typescript catalog).

msItem.note: Given as a continuation of Gríms saga loðinkinna with separate chapter enumeration. This saga, along with the two previous items, are heavily abbreviated. They may be copies of AM 173 fol. or some related MS (cf. redaction E in Rafn's 1829 ed. and typescript catalog).

msItem.title: Finnboga saga ramma
msItem.incipit: Asbiorn hiet madur hann var kalladur Dettiäs

filiation.p: Based on AM 510 4to or a related MS (cf. typescript catalog).

msItem.note: Defective? Seems to be missing part of the penultimate and the final chapter; possibly unfinished (most of fol. 215v and all of fol 216r-v left blank).

msItem.title: Ambales saga
msItem.incipit: Donrich hiet kongur er riede fyrer Spania
msItem.explicit: kongur Ambalet stirde loflega riki synu til daudadags og sydann hans son Godfreir. Finis.

filiation.p: Based on AM 521c 4to or a related MS (cf. typescript catalog).

msItem.title: Hálfdanar þáttur svarta
Hálfdanar þáttr svarta
msItem.rubric: Hier hefur upp Þatt af Halfdana Svarta
msItem.incipit: Halfdan kongur tok kongdom XVIII vetra
msItem.explicit: enn þad var bannad af frændum hans

filiation.p: A copy of GKS 1005 fol. (Flateyjarbók) or a related MS (cf. typescript catalog).

msItem.title: Hrafnkels saga Freysgoða
msItem.rubric: Hier Biriast Saga af Hrafnkiele Goda
msItem.incipit: A dógum Haralldar kongs hins hárfagra
msItem.explicit: og urdu mikler menn firer sier
msItem.finalRubric: og likur hier fra Hrafnkiele ad segia

filiation.p: Text is similar to the one in AM 443 4to.

supportDesc.foliation: Paginated in upper corners. Fol. 216r-v blank.

handDesc.handNote: Written ca. 1786 by Séra Jóhann Bergsveinsson í Árness according to typescript catalog, but some leaves appear to be in another hand (e.g. fols. 117v and 118r).

additions.p: Autograph of Johann Bergsveinsson on flyleaf. Autograph of a certain Gudmundur on fol. 296v. Detached front pastedown contains manuscript waste (part of a letter) dated 26 July 1776 at Skálholt. Another letter in MS waste of rear pastedown dated 20 October 1773 and signed Makia [i.e. Maria?] Theod[...]. Table of contents added later on verso of front flyleaf. ToC also mentions vol. IV of Suhm's Historie af Danmark.

binding.p: Contemporary blind-tooled leather binding over wooden boards.

provenance.p: Purchased by the UB during the first half of the nineteenth century (cf. typescript catalog).

revisionDesc.change: Added template elements. Cataloged from photographs.
